snippet: Calls for a federal review after the state police say a 22-year-old black man fatally shot himself in Louisiana while handcuffed in the back of a cruiser.
abstract: Father of Victor White III, who Louisiana State Police say fatally shot himself while handcuffed in back of police cruiser, is asking Justice Department to investigate the circumstances around his son's death; gun was not found on White even though he was frisked twice, and autopsy report shows no bullet came from behind, as police originally asserted.
lead_paragraph: Calls for a federal review after the state police say a 22-year-old black man fatally shot himself in Louisiana while handcuffed in the back of a cruiser.

headline.main: Father Seeks Answers in Death of Son, Who Police Say Shot Himself While Cuffed
headline.print_headline: Father Seeks Answers in Death of Son, Who Police Say Shot Himself While Cuffed
